org.apache.flink.api.java.utils

类 RequiredParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.utils.RequiredParameters

  • @PublicEvolving
public class RequiredParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Facility to manage required parameters in user defined functions.

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public Option add(java.lang.String name)
           throws RequiredParametersException
        Add a parameter based on its name.
        参数:
        name - - the name of the parameter
        返回:
        - an Option object representing the parameter
        抛出:
        RequiredParametersException - if an option with the same name is already defined

      • add

        public void add(Option option)
         throws RequiredParametersException
        Add a parameter encapsulated in an Option object.
        参数:
        option - - the parameter
        抛出:
        RequiredParametersException - if an option with the same name is already defined

      • applyTo

        public ParameterTool applyTo(ParameterTool parameterTool)
                      throws RequiredParametersException
        Check for all required parameters defined: - has a value been passed - if not, does the parameter have an associated default value - does the type of the parameter match the one defined in RequiredParameters - does the value provided in the parameterTool adhere to the choices defined in the option.

        If any check fails, a RequiredParametersException is thrown

        参数:
        parameterTool - - parameters supplied by the user.
        返回:
        the updated ParameterTool containing all the required parameters
        抛出:
        RequiredParametersException - if any of the specified checks fail

                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> data)
                                throws RequiredParametersException
        抛出:

      • getHelp

        public java.lang.String getHelp()
        Build a help text for the defined parameters.

        The format of the help text will be: Required Parameters: \t -:shortName:, --:name: \t :helpText: \t default: :defaultValue: \t choices: :choices: \n

        返回:
        a formatted help String.

      • getHelp

        public java.lang.String getHelp(java.util.List<java.lang.String> missingArguments)
        Build a help text for the defined parameters and list the missing arguments at the end of the text.

        The format of the help text will be: Required Parameters: \t -:shortName:, --:name: \t :helpText: \t default: :defaultValue: \t choices: :choices: \n

        Missing parameters: \t param1 param2 ... paramN

        参数:
        missingArguments - - a list of missing parameters
        返回:
        a formatted help String.

      • helpText

        private java.lang.String helpText(Option option)
        for the given option create a line for the help text. The line looks like: \t -:shortName:, --:name: \t :helpText: \t default: :defaultValue: \t choices: :choices:

      • missingArgumentsText

        private java.lang.String missingArgumentsText(java.util.List<java.lang.String> missingArguments)
